sentences.sContent: Rembrandt began to work as a professional portraitist about 1631.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rembrandt began to work as a professional portraitist about 1631.
sentences.sCn: 伦勃朗成为一名职业画家的时间约是1631年。

sentences.sContent: Ben Heine is a painter, illustrator, portraitist, caricaturist and photographer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ben Heine is a painter, illustrator, portraitist, caricaturist and photographer.
sentences.sCn: Ben Heine 是一个画家、插画家、肖像画家、漫画家和、摄影家。

sentences.sContent: Both of us had chosen Simmie Knox to paint our portraits: we liked Knox’s lifelike style, and he would be the first African-American portraitist to have his work hang in the White House.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both of us had chosen Simmie Knox to paint our portraits: we liked Knox’s lifelike style, and he would be the first African-American portraitist to have his work hang in the White House.
sentences.sCn: 我俩都选了西米·诺克斯来为我们画像：我们欣赏他逼真的风格，他也将成为第一位将作品悬挂在白宫的非裔画家。

words.tran: 肖像画；肖像绘制；人像摄影
记述者；描画者；肖像画家

trans.tranOther: A portraitist is an artist who paints or draws people's portraits
